name: AI Chatbot
description: A lightweight conversational AI chatbot built with Python that demonstrates NLP text generation and interactive chatting.

name: Image Classification Model
description: Deep learning-based image classifier using TensorFlow/PyTorch with a web demo and prediction output.

name: Audio Classifier
description: A simple audio event detection model with spectrogram visualization and prediction results.

name: Object Detection (Vision)
description: YOLO-based object detection model demo showcasing bounding boxes, labels, and real-time inference.

name: Text Summarizer
description: An AI-powered text summarization tool that condenses long content into short summaries using transformer models.

name: Prompt Engineering (Jasonprompt)
description: Collection of prompt-engineering examples, prompt templates and notes for working with generative AI models.

name: Python Challenges
description: Small Python practice problems, coding exercises and sample solutions for learning fundamentals and algorithms.

name: Streamlit Demos
description: Interactive Streamlit apps and demos showcasing web UIs for ML/AI experiments and small data visualizations.

name: Flask Web Examples
description: Small Flask web application examples demonstrating routing, templates and simple back-end patterns.

name: PyAutoGUI Automations
description: Desktop automation scripts using PyAutoGUI — useful for GUI automation, RPA proof-of-concepts and task automation.

name: Age Calculator (script)
description: Simple Python utility to compute age from date of birth — demonstrates basic input handling and date arithmetic.

name: BMI Calculator (script)
description: Lightweight BMI calculator script showing user input, validation and basic health metric computation.

name: RPA Demo Script
description: Automation / RPA demonstration script (rpademo.py) — automates repetitive desktop tasks for demo purposes.

name: Intro Notebook & Worksheets
description: Introductory Python notebook and worksheets (Week 1) for beginner-level exercises and guided learning.

name: Prompts & Notes
description: Markdown notes and prompts (prompt.md and README.md) with quick references and examples.
